## AbstractDevice interface

Abstract interface for the rendering device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface AbstractDevice extends IEventTarget<DeviceEventMap> 
```
**Extends:** [IEventTarget](doc/markdown/./base.ieventtarget.md)<!-- -->&lt;[DeviceEventMap](doc/markdown/./device.deviceeventmap.md)<!-- -->&gt;
